price: 27. Als U hen laat, dan zullen zij Uw dienaren misleiden en zij zullen niemand behalve slechte ongelovigen krijgen als kinderen.
arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّواْ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓاْ إِلَّا فَاجِرٗا كَفَّارٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: innaka in tadharhum yuḍillū ʿibādaka walā yalidū illā fājiran kaffāran
